section.title: Updating Resources
section.para: Use the following methods to update attributes in a resource:

listitem.para: Update a resource via the PUT HTTP Method
Update a resource via a POST Method with an edit action.
Update a resource via the PATCH HTTP Method

section.para: While PUT is the common method, the PATCH mechanism gives better control on which attribute to edit or add, and enables removal, which is not available with the other two methods.
